abstract: Wheels column; Bosch will mass market WaterBoost, system that uses water injection to improve fuel efficiency of turbocharged engines for passenger cars, without reduction in power; science has been around since World War II but has never been commercial success; Bosch system is being used in BMW's M4 GTS high performance vehicles and engineering company is hoping technology will finally catch on.
lead_paragraph: Water injection technology is well-known, but has not caught on in consumer autos. Bosch is betting that environmental regulations will help it go mainstream.
snippet: Water injection technology is well-known, but has not caught on in consumer autos. Bosch is betting that environmental regulations will help it go mainstream....

headline.main: How Do You Make Turbo Engines More Efficient? Just Add Water
headline.print_headline: How to Make Turbo Engines Efficient: Just Add Water
